docs.snippet: El Salvador's national police director says homicides dropped more than 20 percent in 2016, though the rate of 81.2 for every 100,000 residents kept the Central American country among the world's deadliest....

headline.main: Homicides Fall in El Salvador, but Remains Among Deadliest
